attributes.action: Ban adult porn channels from Freeview
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As Freeview is a service that is beamed into more or less everyone's home now I ask the Government to shut down the Adult channels that run late at night until 5.30am.
 The channels are not only a money making scam but by what is shown corrupts minds. I am especially concerned about children in their rooms up in the early hours watching this.
 Writing to Ofcom they tell me 3 of the channels are licensed by the Nederlands and 2 regulated by Ofcom. 
It is about time action was taken against these channels now before we end up with dozens of them.
